TEXT.TITLE: NATIONAL ENTERTAINMENT <NENT> REVERSE SPLIT SET
TEXT.BODY: National Entertainment Corp said shareholdersapproved a one-for-25 reverse stock split and a name change to Major Video Corp, both effective March 16. It said its new ticker symbol will be <MAJV>. The company also said it expects to add nine company-owned and franchised Major Video stores in the next 60 days. It now operates 64. Reuter
